title: alcyone553
author: alcyone553
content: Attention to all buyersAB test or Satoshi by sellerSeller procedure:1. Zoom call2. Buyer will show bank statement as proof of fund3. Seller to show BTC wallet ( it's already there)4. Seller to show AB test or Satoshi to prove wallet control(POC)5. Buyer will remit fund bank to bank starting with small qty (50 BTC)6. Seller to transfer BTC once credit received in the bank7. Several tranches8. Buyer will go firstProcedures fixed no changes allowedNo broker chains / only buyers or  mandate will be consideredBuyer contact seller /telegram :  @Johngreg553
